name: WarpGun
description:
WarpGun is a top-down shooter. A game with a focus on puzzle-solving while under the pressure of time.

The gimmick is that the player cannot move and must instead utilise the WarpGun by shooting at warp points to teleport.

The aim is to strategically navigate through each level to the end so the player can move on to the next Puzzle.

A level consists of a single screen with a set map each consisting of the player, warp points, coins, mines and turrets. 

While the player can spend extra time collecting coins, this will put them in greater danger. Spend more of their time confronting the turrets.

If the player collects enough coins, they can purchase upgrades to increase the character’s ability or to change up their aesthetics. 

How to play

*The only needed control for WarpGun is from the mouse. moving the control the player and left click to shoot.

*Shooting buttons will trigger them.

*Play the premade levels in the level selector.

*Look at the RULES page in game to see what does what.

*If you collect enough coins you can buy upgrades at the shop!

*design your own level in the level editor.
